attributes.action: Invest heavily in a HIV cure!
attributes.additional_details:
In 2013 over 100,000 people in the UK were living with HIV, and this figure is way to high and will continue to rise. We Need a great deal MORE investment in finding a cure as in the short time it could cost billions, though in the longer term, it could save a lot more.

If yourself and anyone you know suffers from HIV and think that it's time a cure was finally found please sign as a matter of urgency.

Thank you
